1000019.name: [ce9d51]Monthly Card[-]
1000019.title: Monthly Card
1000019.prompt: Thank you so much for playing our game. Have a nice time!
1000019.content_0:
[00b2fc]Description[-]

[ce9d51]Requirement[-]
[fe0000]Single purchase of $9 or more during the event.[-]

[ce9d51]Bonus[-]
[fe0000]A daily reward of 200 gems in 30 consecutive days, starting from the day of purchase.[-]

[ce9d51]Notice[-]
[fe0000]You can renew the privilege only if your previous one will expire in 3 days or less. In that case, remaining time will be added to 30 more days.[-]

1000004.name: [ce9d51]LVL Rush[-]
1000004.title: LVL Rush
1000004.content_0:
[00b2fc]Description[-]

[ce9d51]During the event, reach required level to obtain great rewards:[-]

[ffff00]Reach LV.25 to get :[-]    [fe0000]50,000 gold;[-]

[ffff00]Reach LV.35 to get:[-]    [fe0000]100,000 gold;[-]

[ffff00]Reach LV.45 to get :[-]    [fe0000]30 Magic Crystals;[-]

[ffff00]Reach LV.50 to get :[-]    [fe0000]200 gems;[-]

[ffff00]Reach LV.55 to get :[-]    [fe0000]500 gems.[-]

1000005.name: [ce9d51]Power Rush[-]
1000005.title: Power Rush
1000005.content_0:
[00b2fc]Description[-]

[ce9d51]During the event, reach required power to obtain great rewards:[-]

[ffff00]Reach 10,000 power to get : [-]    [fe0000]10 Holy Fruits;[-]

[ffff00]Reach 20,000 power to get : [-]    [fe0000]15 Holy Fruits;[-]

[ffff00]Reach 50,000 power to get : [-]    [fe0000]20 Holy Fruits, and 1 LV4. Spirit Stone;[-]

[ffff00]Reach 100,000 power to get : [-]    [fe0000]25 Holy Fruits, and 1 LV5. Spirit Stone;[-]

[ffff00]Reach 150,000 power to get : [-]    [fe0000]50 Holy Fruits, 2 LV5. Spirit Stone, and 1 Overwhelming Dominance (to boost your power).[-]

1000010.name: [ce9d51]Consume & Gift[-]
1000010.title: Consume & Gift
1000010.content_0:
[00b2fc]Description[-]

[ce9d51]Accumulate Consume Event: during the event, reach accumulate consume amount to obtain great rewards:[-]

[ffff00]Consume 2,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]120,000 gold;[-]

[ffff00]Consume 6,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]150,000 gold and 10 LV.1 Forgement Stones;[-]

[ffff00]Consume 10,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]300,000 gold and 25 LV.2 Forgement Stones;[-]

[ffff00]Consume 14,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]300,000 gold, 25 LV.2 Forgement Stones, and 20 Magic Crystals;[-]

[ffff00]Consume 20,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]900,000 gold, 50 LV.2 Forgement Stones, 60 Magic Crystals, and 1 Metallic Power;[-]

[ffff00]Consume 40,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]1,800,000 gold, 67 LV.3 Forgement Stones, 120 Magic Crystals, and 20 Holy Fruits;[-]

[ffff00]Consume 100,000 gems to get : [-]    [fe0000]1,800,000 gold, 135 LV.3 Forgement Stones, 200 Magic Crystals, 60 Holy Fruits, and 1 LV.60 Legendary Equipment.[-]

1000008.name: [ce9d51]Double EXP[-]
1000008.title: Double EXP
1000008.prompt:
[00b2fc]Notice:[-]

After the event, the above EXP rewards will be back to normal.
1000008.content_0:
[00b2fc]Description[-]

[ce9d51]EXP Double Event: [-]

[ffff00]During the event, EXP rewards from Story, Inferno and Multiplayer Dungeons are doubled. (EXP reward increase by 100%)[-]

3000001.name: [ce9d51]Game Feedback[-]
3000001.title: Game Feedback
3000001.content_0:
[ce9d51]Dear players,
We are more than happy to have you in Rise of Darkness. We spare no efforts in making ROD a good game, but we still need your assistance to make it even better. 
During the event, all players are welcome to sound off on ROD Facebook Fans page (https://www.facebook.com/riseofdarknessgame). Feel free to tell us your opinions, suggestions, or any bug in ROD. For example, you can tell us which part of ROD you enjoy most and why. We will select 50 feedbacks and then reward each contributor with 100 gems.
Following's the suggested format of feedback:[-]

  [fe0000]Content:
  Feedback:
  Server:
  Character name:[-]

3000002.name: [ce9d51]Language Check[-]
3000002.title: Language Check
3000002.content_0:
[ce9d51]Dear players,
Rise of Darkness Closed Beta kicks off! 
During your gaming experience, if you find any language mistake, give feedback on ROD Facebook Fans page (https://www.facebook.com/riseofdarknessgame). Feel free to tell us your opinions, suggestions, or translation mistake you find in ROD. We will select some feedbacks and then reward contributors with 100,000 gold.
Following's the suggested format of feedback:[-]

  [fe0000]Content:
  Feedback:
  Server:
  Character name:[-]

1000024.name: [ce9d51]Double EXP[-]
1000024.title: Double EXP
1000024.prompt:
[00b2fc]Notice:[-]

After the event, the above EXP rewards will be back to normal.
1000024.content_0:
[00b2fc]Description[-]

[ce9d51]Content:
Warrior, congrats for activating the Blood Crystal, which will release power and activate Light Seal in Human world. When the Seal is activated, potentials in warrior will be awaken. During that time, battles bring extra rewards.[-]
[ffff00]During the event, players get double EXP rewards in Story, Inferno, and Multiplayer (mop-up included).[-]
[ce9d51]Get ready for your fight, warrior! The Light Seal is about to be activated![-]
